element.definition: The matter of concern in the context of this provision of the agrement.
element.comment: The Contract.term.topic, as a Contract Resource subpart, is handled in the same manner as the Contract Resource as discussed above.
element.requirements: A contract term topic is typically about a portion of the contract topic which has additional or specialized rights, privileges, obligations, restrictions, and prohibitions that are binding on any grantor and grantee parties upon the execution of the contract. Contract.term.topic may be described in more detail in the [0..*] Contract.term.valuedItem @[0..1] Contract.term.valuedItem [x] Definition: Specific type of Contract Provision Valued Item that may be priced. CodeableConcept|Reference(Any) [See Contract.topic Requirements for further elaboration on this requirement.].
